headline: Epam (EPAM) Beats Q2 Earnings Estimates (Revised)
summary: Epam (EPAM) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 6.13% and +1.53%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: EPAM’s (NYSE:EPAM) Q2 Sales Beat Estimates, Guides for Strong Sales Next Quarter
summary: Digital engineering services company EPAM Systems (NYSE:EPAM) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 18% year on year to $1.35 billion. Guidance for next quarter’s revenue was better than expected at $1.37 billion at the midpoint, 1.5% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.77 per share was 6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: EPAM’s GenAI Platform ‘DIAL’ Now Available on AWS Marketplace
summary: EPAM Systems Inc. (NYSE:EPAM) is one of the cheap technology stocks to buy now. headline: Epam: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results fell short of Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of eight analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $2.61 per share. The information technology services provider posted revenue of $1.35 billion in the period, beating Street forecasts.

headline: EPAM Reports Results for Second Quarter 2025 and Raises Full Year Revenue Outlook
summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM), a leading digital transformation services and product engineering company, today announced results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2025.
